name: id
description: This is used for the main component and to compose the ID attribute for each item.

name: namePrefix
description: Optional prefix. This is used to prefix each item `name`, separated by `-`.

name: items
description: The inputs within the date input component.

params.name: id
params.description: Item-specific ID. If provided, it will be used instead of the generated ID.

params.name: label
params.description: Item-specific label text. If provided, this will be used instead of `name` for item label text.

params.name: value
params.description: If provided, it will be used as the initial value of the input.

params.name: autocomplete
params.description: Attribute to [identify input purpose](https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/identify-input-purpose.html), for instance `"bday-day"`. See [autofill](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/form-control-infrastructure.html#autofill) for full list of attributes that can be used.

params.name: pattern
params.description: Attribute to [provide a regular expression pattern](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/sec-forms.html#the-pattern-attribute), used to match allowed character combinations for the input value.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to date input item.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the date input tag.

name: hint
description: Can be used to add a hint to a date input component.

name: errorMessage
description: Can be used to add an error message to the date input component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

name: formGroup
description: Additional options for the form group containing the date input component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (for example to show error state for the whole group).

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the form group.

params.name: beforeInputs
params.description: Content to add before the inputs used by the date input component.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add before the inputs. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add before the inputs. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: afterInputs
params.description: Content to add after the inputs used by the date input component.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add after the inputs. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add after the inputs. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

name: fieldset
description: Can be used to add a fieldset to the date input component.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the date-input container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the date-input container.
